scripts.cli: npm install -g copyfiles & npm install -g jsonmerge & npm install -g tfx-cli
scripts.build:XmlTransformV1: cd XmlTransformV1 & npm install & npm run build
scripts.start:XmlTransformV1: cd XmlTransformV1 & npm install & npm run start
scripts.vsix:copy: copyfiles img/** */out/** */node_modules/** */*.json vss-extension*.json README.md license.txt out
scripts.configs:dev: npm run configs:vss:dev && npm run configs:XmlTransformV1:dev
scripts.configs:prod: npm run configs:vss:prod && npm run configs:XmlTransformV1:prod
